improvement_recommendations.title: Implement physics-based elliptical fire spread
improvement_recommendations.description: Replace simple cellular automaton with elliptical wave propagation model that accounts for wind-driven elongation
improvement_recommendations.rationale: Extreme fires (ROS >80 m/min) show elongated elliptical growth, not circular cell-by-cell spread
improvement_recommendations.expected_improvement: Reduce area prediction error from 97% to <50%

improvement_recommendations.title: Scale iterations dynamically based on ROS
improvement_recommendations.description: Calculate required iterations as function of ROS, simulation duration, and domain size
improvement_recommendations.rationale: Fixed 80 iterations inadequate when ROS=95 m/min for 30 hours
improvement_recommendations.expected_improvement: Ensure fire has time to reach observed extent

improvement_recommendations.title: Increase spotting frequency for crown fires
improvement_recommendations.description: When CFB >0.9, increase spotting probability from 0.05 to 0.15-0.25 per iteration
improvement_recommendations.rationale: Active crown fires produce abundant firebrands, creating numerous spot fires

improvement_recommendations.title: Add Fort McMurray 2016 to continuous validation suite
improvement_recommendations.description: Run Fort McMurray scenario in every evolution cycle to track improvement
improvement_recommendations.rationale: Need continuous validation against extreme fire to prevent regression
